mapper.select: select * from t_order_settlement where ORDER_SETTLEMENT_ID=#{orderSettlementId} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'
select * from t_order_settlement where ORDER_SETTLEMENT_UUID=#{uuid} and ALIVE_FLAG='1'

SELECT toder.ID AS orderId ,toder.ORDER_NO AS orderNo ,toder.SELLER_CUSTOMER_ID AS sellerCustomerId ,toder.BUYER_CUSTOMER_ID AS buyerCustomerId ,tog.ZH_NAME AS zhName ,tog.QUANTITY AS quantity ,tog.SPEC AS spec ,tope.TRADE_TERM AS tradeTerm ,tope.BASE_PRICE AS basePrice ,tope.PRICE_FORMULA AS priceFormula ,tope.AGIO AS agio ,tope.PRICING_DESC AS pricingDesc ,tope.PAYMENT_TERM AS paymentTerm ,tof.TOTAL_FEE AS totalFee ,tott.LOADING_PORT AS loadingPort ,tott.UPLOADING_PORT AS uploadingPort ,DATE_FORMAT(tott.DELIVERY_DATE_START, '%Y-%m-%d') AS deliveryDateStart ,DATE_FORMAT(tott.DELIVERY_DATE_END, '%Y-%m-%d') AS deliveryDateEnd ,DATE_FORMAT(tott.DISCHARGE_DATE_START, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dischargeDateStart ,DATE_FORMAT(tott.DISCHARGE_DATE_END, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dischargeDateEnd FROM t_order toder LEFT JOIN t_order_goods tog ON toder.ID = tog.ORDER_ID AND tog.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' LEFT JOIN t_order_price tope ON toder.ID = tope.ORDER_ID AND tope.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' LEFT JOIN t_order_transport tott ON toder.ID = tott.ORDER_ID AND tott.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' LEFT JOIN t_order_fee tof ON toder.ID = tof.ORDER_ID AND tof.ALIVE_FLAG = '1' WHERE toder.ID = #{orderId} AND toder.ALIVE_FLAG = '1'
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOTAL_FEE),0) FROM `t_order_settlement` WHERE ALIVE_FLAG = '1' AND ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
